item.title: March of the Giants
item.description: The September 2017 Sumo Grand Tournament at the Ryōgoku Kokugikan in Tokyo.

item.title: Curry Udon Recipe
item.description: Grab an onion, garlic, potato, carrot, stock, sake, Glico curry, beef, udon.

item.title: Kisyuu
item.description: My calligraphy intructor, Kisyuu, doing a performance piece with taiko accompaniment at Sakura Days 2017 in the Van Deusen Botanical Garden.

item.title: Japan Unlayered
item.description: Muji's Masaaki Kanai tells us about 90° socks, the 80% rule, and a mattress with legs in his talk, The Antithesis of Consumerism and the Search for a Better Way of Living.

item.title: An Ordered List of Haruki Murakami Books
item.description: The Wind-up Bird Chronical, Underground, Norwegian Wood, Kafka on the Store, A Wild Sheep Chase, The Strange Library.

item.title: What I learn to study Japanese
item.description: Vancouver Japanese Language School, NHK News Web Easy, Kanji cards, Japanese with Ammo, Japanese-English Parallel fiction, Slack.

item.title: Talisman
item.description: From the Kanda-myōjin shrine, a talisman to protect electronic devices from harm.
